Articles.Content: Where are the meteor showers, comets and asteroid belts??
I think the addition of comets would be a cool post 1.0 addition, maybe in a cooperation with the ESA.

> 
> I think the addition of comets would be a cool post 1.0 addition, maybe in a cooperation with the ESA.

This. This so much. official ESA parts!
Oh yes. I like the idea. They would show up in randon places on the sky and contracts like "Go there and recover that flying rock" would pop up. Or call geologists. Or something.

This would be a great addition but, unfortunately, the original asteroid code was written to only generate them on Kerbin intercepts. Hopefully someone can change the code to allow modders, or hell, even the KSP devs, to generate asteroids elsewhere. I think it'd be great to see random asteroids show up in belt orbits, or Jool trojans, or whatever. Would help make the rest of the solar system really come alive.
What we need are more boxes.

> 
> Where are the meteor showers, comets and asteroid belts??

I know exactly where they are. They are on the "[What not to suggest](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36863-What-not-to-suggest)" list.
